response.overview: Bam 6.6 is a documentary about the 2003 Bam earthquake in Iran. The film, subtitled "Humanity has no Borders", was produced and directed by Jahangir Golestanparast. The film documents the plight of American tourists Tobb Dell'Oro and his Jewish fianc√©e, Adele Freedman, after they are buried under the quake's rubble
response.title: Bam 6.6
